pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhārenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:7.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāressantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhārentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāressanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc87:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
